CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Application Site Creation without Sites.FullControl.All
CurrentVersion.description: Currently an application requires Sites.FullControl.All to create new site collections within a tenant. This work will allow applications to use a new scope, Sites.Create.All, to create new site collections without accessing any existing content. During the site creation process the application can request access to the new site, allowing for provisioning scenarios with reduced tenant permissions. This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Application Site Creation without Sites.FullControl.All
OldVersion.description: Currently an application requires Sites.FullControl.All to create new site collections within a tenant. This work will allow applications to use a new scope, Sites.Create.All, to create new site collections without accessing any existing content. During the site creation process the application can request access to the new site, allowing for provisioning scenarios with reduced tenant permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting
CurrentVersion.description: Now, Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting when recording is enabled. This, along with meeting transcript and meeting chat, enables users to ask Copilot to summarize or find specific information from screen-shared content (e.g., ‘Which products had the highest sales?’), consolidate insights across both the conversation and presentation (e.g., 'What was the feedback per slide?'), and draft new content based on the entire meeting (e.g., 'Rewrite the paragraph shared on the screen incorporating the feedback from the chat’). This works for any content shared while sharing your desktop screen (including but not limited to documents, slides, spreadsheets, and websites, irrespective of platform or app). Support for PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard in Teams will be available at a later date.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New email scoring capabilities
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider risk management (IRM) email scoring logic is being updated. With current logic, a single email to multiple recipients (say “n”) is counted multiple times (n times), and this is creating noise by increasing the risk score. In the new logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted once, and this new principle is applicable to the email containing multiple unallowed domains or priority content. Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New email scoring capabilities
OldVersion.description:
Insider risk management (IRM) email scoring logic is being updated. With current logic, a single email to multiple recipients (say “n”) is counted multiple times (n times), and this is creating noise by increasing the risk score. In the new logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted once, and this new principle is applicable to the email containing multiple unallowed domains or priority content. Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

These scenarios require Slimcore-based optimization, as WebRTC-based optimization does not support meetings across different cloud environments.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Introducing the SCO Setting in Walkie Talkie app for Enhanced Battery Life on older Bluetooth headsets
CurrentVersion.description: This feature introduces SCO (Synchronous Connection-Oriented) user setting in the Walkie Talkie app. This feature is designed to manage the Bluetooth headset connection to optimize battery life. When a Bluetooth headset is connected to the Walkie Talkie app, the SCO setting controls whether the microphone remains constantly connected or disconnects after a period of inactivity. This helps in reducing battery drain by allowing the headset to disconnect when not in use and reconnect when needed.  The user control feature allows users to set a timeout period after which the Bluetooth headset will automatically disconnect if there is no activity. While the SCO setting is turned on, users may experience a slight delay in transmission as the headset reconnects. However, once the headset is reconnected, users will hear a sound indicating that they can start transmitting on the app. This brief delay is a small trade-off for the substantial battery savings on older Bluetooth headsets.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Introducing the SCO Setting in Walkie Talkie app for Enhanced Battery Life on older Bluetooth headsets

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites.  Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection: SharePoint Online extends library permissions to downloaded files
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability ties together SharePoint Online library permissions with Purview sensitivity labeling and protection. SharePoint Online document library owners can set a label on the library, automatically applying that label to all unprotected and unlabeled Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files in the target library. Files downloaded from these libraries are protected at download. Users accessing these files outside of SharePoint Online have their rights evaluated in real time against the document library. Changes to user permissions on the document library are reflected on downloaded files, including full revocation for users removed from the document library. This provides a more centralized information worker-managed permission model that also offers revocation capabilities at a user level, rather than per-document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Animated GIFs in email
CurrentVersion.description: We are bringing animated GIFs to email crafted by Viva Amplify.  GIFs of limited size will appear as animations in Outlook clients.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Multiple column layouts in email
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Amplify authored email will support two column layouts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Extensibility - Admins can manage Copilot extensibility under Copilot tab in Microsoft 365 admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins have options to manage Copilot extensibility under Copilot tab including agent management for IT published agents and shared agents.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Premium - Protect PDF with password
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Premium users can now secure their PDF files by adding protection that restricts unauthorized access through OneDrive Web. This feature allows you to set an open password, which is required to access the PDF, or an owner password, which sets permissions for actions such as printing or editing the document. This ensures your files remain secure and only accessible to authorized individuals.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Protect PDF with Password on OneDrive for Web
OldVersion.description: With this capability, OneDrive web users can protect their PDF files with User Password and Owner Password. The User Password is required to open and view a PDF file. The Owner Password is used to set permissions on a PDF file, such as grant permissions on printing, copying, or modifying the content.

CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows organizations to monitor Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat adoption in Copilot.cloud.microsoft/Teams/Outlook for users without Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. It enhances the Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat report by providing metrics on the number of active users of Copilot.cloud.microsoft/Teams/Outlook and the last activity date for each user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - SharePoint storage insights, actions, and resources

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - SharePoint Quota Consumption and recommendations
OldVersion.description: This feature allows organizations to monitor Microsoft 365 SharePoint Quota Consumption and their usage growth over time. It enhances the report by providing single pane access to the above metrics along with recommendations to storage decluttering and storage optimization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Standard and Basic licensed Teams rooms on Windows in the Pro Management portal

IT admins get a unified device management experience through the Pro Management portal where they can manage those devices with the same functionality found in Teams admin center for that license type.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Standard and Basic licensed Teams rooms in the Pro Management portal
OldVersion.description: The Teams Rooms Pro Management portal now supports and enforces licenses for devices in rooms using Standard and Basic licenses. IT now has a unified admin experience and can manage these devices with functions similar to those of the Teams admin center through the Pro Management portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ask Copilot to rewrite text as a list
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in PowerPoint will rewrite paragraphs into bullet points or lists.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: OneDrive: New annotation layout and tools for PDF editing
CurrentVersion.description: The new PDF annotation layout features a more intuitive design where all annotation tools are now conveniently located in a single row at the top of the screen. A new type of eraser has been added to allow for more precise editing which can remove annotations pixel by pixel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New predicate in Email DLP - Detect number of domains/Recipients
CurrentVersion.description: The "Recipient/Domain Count Over" feature, designed to address a critical need for managing and controlling the distribution of sensitive information via email. This feature allows organizations to set specific policies that trigger alerts or actions when the number of recipients or domains in outgoing emails exceeds a defined threshold. By implementing this feature, organizations can enhance data security, ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, and prevent unauthorized data dissemination, providing peace of mind and safeguarding sensitive information.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Search with apps and agents personalized suggestionss
CurrentVersion.description: We are enhancing Teams search personalized suggestions to include apps and agents. When searching in Teams you will now also get apps and agent suggestions which dynamically update as you type.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Recipient-triggered policy tips (policy tip to wait for recipient)
CurrentVersion.description: This feature ensures that policy tips are displayed only after recipients are added to an email, minimizing user disruption from DLP policy tips. With this improvement, relevant policy tips are only shown to users as they draft emails after the proper policy conditions are met.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control When Shared Content Is Visible to Attendees in 'Manage what attendees see'
CurrentVersion.description: An enhancement to the 'Manage what attendees see' feature, allowing organizers and presenters to control when shared content is visible to attendees. This capability is available for Meetings, Webinars and Town halls.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: External tag in contact suggestions
CurrentVersion.description: An "External" tag will be added to contact suggestions that appear in the dropdown when entering contacts in the email compose form. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Secure password deployment in the Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description: The secure password deployment feature in the Edge management service enables admins to deploy encrypted shared passwords to a set of users, allowing them to log into websites seamlessly without ever seeing the actual passwords. This reduces the risk of unauthorized access and enhances the organization's overall security posture.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Paste to Browser prevention support on macOS device with endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Endpoint Data Loss Prevention adds support on users trying to paste sensitive content into web browsers on macOS devices using Edge, Safari, and other browsers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- MacOS parity – Full file evidence
CurrentVersion.description: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) can copy the item that matches a DLP policy from onboarded MacOS devices to an Azure storage account. This creates full file evidence parity for MacOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Rework of Work Feed on Edge New Tab Page (NTP)
CurrentVersion.description:
The Work Feed experience, available on the New Tab Page (NTP) for Commercial users, will have changing and updated functionalities. These changes will include renewed focus on productivity and M365 modules. 

New tab page policies will continue to be enforced and not impacted by this updated Work Feed experience.

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: Designer is now part of Copilot, enhanced with new template and slide Suggestions.
CurrentVersion.description: Designer is now part of Copilot. Copilot Suggestions now brings you familiar Designer slide layout and presentation template suggestions in a vertical gallery, along with new capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: 2-click view of encrypted emails in New Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will now support 2-click view for encrypted emails. This feature enables admins to require user confirmation before allowing access to encrypted emails. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for meeting participants to edit their display name
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting participants will be able to edit their display name, enabling more flexibility in their meeting presence, regardless of their tenant set display name. Users can make this change during the meeting and it will persist throughout the duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Application Site Creation without Sites.FullControl.All
CurrentVersion.description: Currently an application requires Sites.FullControl.All to create new site collections within a tenant. This work will allow applications to use a new scope, Sites.Create.All, to create new site collections without accessing any existing content. During the site creation process the application can request access to the new site, allowing for provisioning scenarios with reduced tenant permissions. This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting
CurrentVersion.description: Now, Copilot in Teams can analyze content shared on-screen during a meeting when recording is enabled. This, along with meeting transcript and meeting chat, enables users to ask Copilot to summarize or find specific information from screen-shared content (e.g., ‘Which products had the highest sales?’), consolidate insights across both the conversation and presentation (e.g., 'What was the feedback per slide?'), and draft new content based on the entire meeting (e.g., 'Rewrite the paragraph shared on the screen incorporating the feedback from the chat’). This works for any content shared while sharing your desktop screen (including but not limited to documents, slides, spreadsheets, and websites, irrespective of platform or app). Support for PowerPoint Live and Whiteboard in Teams will be available at a later date.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook Mobile - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
CurrentVersion.description: When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
CurrentVersion.description: When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
CurrentVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove learning objects shown in In-progress section
CurrentVersion.description: Users can remove learning objects shown in the In-progress section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Search past sessions in Copilot Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Search through your past Copilot conversations in Copilot Chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Share a prompt to a Microsoft Teams team
CurrentVersion.description: Share custom prompts with members of a Microsoft Teams team, allowing team members to easily discover and utilize these prompts in Copilot Prompt Gallery.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts on local files when using Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: Ground prompts on local files when using Copilot with Graph-grounded chat by clicking "Upload" in the ContextIQ interface.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Auto-discarding Sleeping Tabs
CurrentVersion.description: Tabs that have been sleeping for a long time will be discarded to save memory. When a user navigates back to a discarded tab, the tab will need to be reloaded. This can be managed through the AutoDiscardSleepingTabsEnabled policy. This policy will be enabled if the SleepingTabsEnabled policy is enabled.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Entry point change - apps when reading emails moved to the ribbon
CurrentVersion.description: The Apps flyout and entry point for pinned apps will be moved to the Home tab in the Ribbon in the New Outlook and Outlook for Web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Access: Integrate Monaco framework to improve SQL editor capabilities
CurrentVersion.description: The Monaco Editor is the fully featured code editor from VS Code with standard IDE functionality such as syntax highlighting, IntelliSense, and autocomplete.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Guided upgrade of applications
CurrentVersion.description: Enterprise Application Management enables you to easily update previously provisioned EAM applications with a securely hosted enterprise catalog.

CurrentVersion.description: This creates the new virtual printer—OneNote (Desktop) - Protected—for OneNote Windows app, built on top of the Microsoft IPP class print driver. This printer will be compliant and functional with Widows Protected Print (WPP) mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot takes emails and meetings into account while drafting content in Word
CurrentVersion.description: You will no longer need to reference certain types of organizational data for Copilot to generate contextually relevant content. People and chats will still need to be referenced explicitly.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar grid keyboard navigation via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description:
When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in day, week, and work week views. #newoutlookforwindows

While rolling out this feature, we detected an issue specifically affecting Outlook on the Web in the Safari browser. Because of this, we have opted to roll back the existing progression to temporarily remove support for Safari. We have now restarted the rollout and support for Safari is planned to be added by mid-2025.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot marks high priority mails in your inbox and provides a short summary of the mail's importance in the message list and the reading pane. Mails can be sorted and filtered by Copilot's priority. In Web and New Outlook for Windows, you can also choose to have Copilot mark low priority mails. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Real-time notifications (Live Activities) for Teams meetings on iOS lock screen
CurrentVersion.description: iOS Live Activities integration for Teams meetings on mobile allows users to view the live progress of a meeting at-a-glance from their lock screen. Real-time notifications with Live Activities automatically update in real-time so users can see when the meeting has started, when it’s in progress, whether recording is on, when someone needs to be admitted from the lobby, and when the meeting has ended. Live Activities is for iPhones only (iOS16.1).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: People Hub improvements in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In new Outlook for Windows, the People Hub offers a streamlined contacts interface with a single view of each person, automatically linking duplicates and enriching them with organizational profiles. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
CurrentVersion.description: LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for leaders in Viva Insights

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort by Flag option

CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing updates that provide capabilities for managing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections. This includes the ability to hide the From Microsoft font packages from Change the look, apply a font package in your site templates, and updated availability for the From Microsoft font packages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enable admins to set default document library label based on container label of a group/site/team

New and edited documents within the default document library will be labeled automatically. If the SharePoint admin had already configured a default document library labeling, this setting will not override it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: DVR (Digital Video Recording) capabilities for town halls on desktop and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now interact with an instance of a live streaming town hall instance in the same way they would a recorded piece of content when viewing via desktop or web. DVR functionality in town hall enables event attendees to pause and move forward or back within a town hall, navigate to any previously-streamed timestamp, and other abilities that make interacting with a town hall more convenient and makes it easier to digest the content being presented. This feature is available for all town halls regardless of the license assigned to the organizers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Share prompts with others in Business Chat and Copilot Lab
CurrentVersion.description: Easily share a prompt with others in the form of a link.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Data export for Viva Glint and Viva Insights data

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Forms data sync support in Excel desktop

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: iPad Multi-Window Support
CurrentVersion.description: Teams now supports multiple windows on iPad. Effortlessly organize your Split View experience with two Teams windows to easily navigate across meetings, chats, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Optional connected experiences privacy setting
CurrentVersion.description: This rollout introduces the privacy setting for "Turn on optional connected experiences" in Outlook on the web which is available in other Office apps today. The setting is found under Settings > General > Privacy and data > Privacy settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Move emails between accounts in the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We’re excited to announce a new feature in Outlook that makes it easier to manage emails across multiple accounts. All personal accounts in the new Outlook for Windows can seamlessly move emails between all their personal accounts, streamlining organization and productivity. For work or school users, this feature is controlled by a policy managed by administrators. By enabling this policy, admins can grant their users the ability to move emails between accounts in a way that aligns with organizational needs and policies. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Account descriptions
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook users can now set custom descriptions for their accounts, making them easier to tell apart in the folder list and various lists and menus across the application. The description can be set in the account settings. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can help monitor response collection and insights
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Forms can now help you monitor and collect responses for your forms, so you can get the data you need with much less effort. Copilot can create a collection plan, track your progress, and let you know when to take action with reminders and insights. Forms can notify you when early insights are ready, and you can easily continue your analysis with Copilot in Excel. Say goodbye to manual follow-ups and hello to smarter collection and analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create the perfect banner for your document with Copilot and Designer
CurrentVersion.description: Chat with Copilot in Word, and let Designer help your document stand out by producing eye-catching visuals that fill the width of the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New email scoring capabilities
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider risk management (IRM) email scoring logic is being updated. With current logic, a single email to multiple recipients (say “n”) is counted multiple times (n times), and this is creating noise by increasing the risk score. In the new logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted once, and this new principle is applicable to the email containing multiple unallowed domains or priority content. Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross Cloud collaboration in VDI
CurrentVersion.description: VDI users can join meetings with people in other Microsoft 365 cloud environments (e.g., a user in GCCH joining a meeting in commercial, GCC or DOD) through three options: authenticated access via cross-cloud meeting connection, authenticated access using a guest account, or anonymous access. These scenarios require Slimcore-based optimization, as WebRTC-based optimization does not support meetings across different cloud environments.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Clipchamp Copilot video creator
CurrentVersion.description: Create a video draft on any topic by providing a prompt. Clipchamp will create a video using stock video and music with an AI-generated voiceover on the topic.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Clipchamp Copilot video creator
CurrentVersion.description: Create a video draft on any topic by providing a prompt. Clipchamp will create a video using stock video and music with an AI-generated voiceover on the topic.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: End user cards in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Employees can now create their own cards that connect to other tools and destinations on Connections dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Preview for Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: This creates Preview mode for authors to view how their Pages and News will look across different device types while editing.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Discover all prompt collections in the new Copilot Prompt Gallery app within Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: The new Copilot Prompt Gallery app provides a central place to find, save, and share prompts available from Microsoft 365 Copilot apps and agents. You can also explore and use a curated selection of suggested prompts organized by role, function, or industry. This app will be available on Teams, Outlook and www.microsoft365.com.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Native Bluetooth call controls over Hands-Free Protocol for multiple peripheral devices
CurrentVersion.description: When you have several peripheral devices connected to Teams, the one you use to answer a call will temporarily become the main device that will be syncing with Teams when using its buttons. After the call, the original device selected in Teams settings will take over again. You can now use multiple native Bluetooth devices and be confident that call controls will function correctly with all of them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Post and reply to questions as an organizer
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall, webinar, and meeting organizers can now post and reply to questions using the title “organizer” in the Q&A experience, instead of their individual names. This feature allows instance organizers to present a unified and official voice when responding to attendee questions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Refreshed Engage Communities app in Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: New, mobile-first experience to participate in communities aligned to personal interests and job functions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin units support for SharePoint Online
CurrentVersion.description: Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users. This update extends support to SharePoint for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Classification improvements on file read access in MacOS devices using Endpoint Data Loss Prevention
CurrentVersion.description: Data classification on files in MacOS devices will be triggered when handling files on read access to improve classification operations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to separate out the Townhall attendee invites
CurrentVersion.description: This backend change will now address the 'separation of attendee' invites from the events crew. This feature allows the organizers of Townhalls to maintain separate invites for attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter joins Townhalls via dial-in
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Townhall presenters will now have the ability to join their townhalls using dial-in details. These details will be available in the body of the invite email they receive from Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Introducing the SCO Setting in Walkie Talkie app for Enhanced Battery Life on older Bluetooth headsets
CurrentVersion.description: This feature introduces SCO (Synchronous Connection-Oriented) user setting in the Walkie Talkie app. This feature is designed to manage the Bluetooth headset connection to optimize battery life. When a Bluetooth headset is connected to the Walkie Talkie app, the SCO setting controls whether the microphone remains constantly connected or disconnects after a period of inactivity. This helps in reducing battery drain by allowing the headset to disconnect when not in use and reconnect when needed.  The user control feature allows users to set a timeout period after which the Bluetooth headset will automatically disconnect if there is no activity. While the SCO setting is turned on, users may experience a slight delay in transmission as the headset reconnects. However, once the headset is reconnected, users will hear a sound indicating that they can start transmitting on the app. This brief delay is a small trade-off for the substantial battery savings on older Bluetooth headsets.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for file upload
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Amplify will support authors uploading a file with a list of emails to make it easier for the Outlook channel to reach large audiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ingestion logs in Viva Learning for SAP SuccessFactors
CurrentVersion.description: This creates LMS ingestion logs for catalog, LRS, and Permissions data. Logs will help admins debug any ingestion-related issues.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Monitor Teams client updates in Teams Admin center
CurrentVersion.description: IT Administrators can now monitor Teams client version update adoption and access detailed adoption information. This feature enables administrators to proactively understand version adoption, assess version health, and access granular details about devices and users who are on the latest client versions. Additionally, it provides visibility on recency of client versions. Administrators can now proactively view insights and address issues preventing users from automatically updating to the latest and most secure version of the Teams client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams client health dashboards in Teams Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: IT Administrators can view and monitor the health of Teams desktop clients on both Windows and Mac platforms. This feature offers comprehensive admin actionable insights into client health metrics, including client crashes and launch failures. Administrators are equipped with detailed information on issues, insights, and mitigation tools to promptly and effectively address any potential client health problems.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Feature Access Management for Copilot in Viva Glint
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will have the ability to enable or disable Microsoft 365 Copilot in Viva Glint for specific users through the M365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Separate role added for downloading the original file evidence for Endpoint
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview has introduced a new separate role for downloading the original evidence for Endpoint. It is applicable for both Customer Managed and Microsoft Managed storage when you try to download the evidence using Purview or XDR portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Enhance the Comment Experience for Live Surveys
CurrentVersion.description: Updating the survey experience to provide ability to display the comment box on the screen when a user is providing a rating. Currently, the survey automatically progresses to the next question after the user selects a rating, without giving them an opportunity to leave a comment. With this change, the program will have the ability for the comment box will be persistently visible, encouraging users to provide more qualitative feedback alongside their rating.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Email Previews for Live Surveys
CurrentVersion.description: Customers can preview and test email notifications for survey start (available in VG), survey reminder and survey end/results rollout after configuring and approving program settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance. These capabilities will be available once Microsoft 365 Copilot is deployed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance. These capabilities will be available once Microsoft 365 Copilot is deployed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams: Send messages to attendees in the meeting lobby with lobby chat
CurrentVersion.description: Now, meeting organizers and co-organizers can send one-way messages to attendees in the lobby via the lobby chat. The Lobby chat is intended to optimize the lobby experience for all participants, ensuring that organizers are better equipped to run external meetings have more control over meetings with external participants, and external attendees are well informed about the meeting upon meeting start.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams: Send messages to attendees in the meeting lobby with lobby chat
CurrentVersion.description: Now, meeting organizers and co-organizers can send one-way messages to attendees in the lobby via the lobby chat. The Lobby chat is intended to optimize the lobby experience for all participants, ensuring that organizers are better equipped to run external meetings have more control over meetings with external participants, and external attendees are well informed about the meeting upon meeting start.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: SharePoint agent analytics on Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Explore how your employees used key SharePoint agent features over a given time period and understand the ROI.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint agent usage statistics across all SharePoint sites
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint agents' usage statistics would be aggregated across all SharePoint sites and available for the SPO/tenant admin persona.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites.  Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection: SharePoint Online extends library permissions to downloaded files
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability ties together SharePoint Online library permissions with Purview sensitivity labeling and protection. SharePoint Online document library owners can set a label on the library, automatically applying that label to all unprotected and unlabeled Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files in the target library. This not only simplifies labeling in bulk across document libraries in an organization but enriches DLP and Copilot with signal to allow admins to monitor and restrict access to this content. Files downloaded from these libraries are protected at download. Users accessing these files outside of SharePoint Online have their rights evaluated in real time against the document library. Changes to user permissions on the document library are reflected on downloaded files, including full revocation for users removed from the document library. This provides a more centralized information worker-managed permission model that also offers revocation capabilities at a user level, rather than per-document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Animated GIFs in email
CurrentVersion.description: We are bringing animated GIFs to email crafted by Viva Amplify.  GIFs of limited size will appear as animations in Outlook clients.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Multiple column layouts in email
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Amplify authored email will support two column layouts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Extensibility - Admins can manage Copilot extensibility under Copilot tab in Microsoft 365 admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins have options to manage Copilot extensibility under Copilot tab including agent management for IT published agents and shared agents.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Premium - Protect PDF with password
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Premium users can now secure their PDF files by adding protection that restricts unauthorized access through OneDrive Web. This feature allows you to set an open password, which is required to access the PDF, or an owner password, which sets permissions for actions such as printing or editing the document. This ensures your files remain secure and only accessible to authorized individuals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Add Copilot.cloud.microsoft/Teams/Outlook usage for Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat usage report
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows organizations to monitor Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat adoption in Copilot.cloud.microsoft/Teams/Outlook for users without Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. It enhances the Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat report by providing metrics on the number of active users of Copilot.cloud.microsoft/Teams/Outlook and the last activity date for each user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - SharePoint storage insights, actions, and resources
CurrentVersion.description: A new Storage tab will be added to usage report for SharePoint within the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new tab will provide visibility into storage quota consumption, a usage trend, and recommended actions and resources for storage management and optimization

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Standard and Basic licensed Teams rooms on Windows in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams Rooms Pro Management portal now supports and enforces licenses for devices in Teams Rooms on Windows with a Standard or Basic license. IT admins get a unified device management experience through the Pro Management portal where they can manage those devices with the same functionality found in Teams admin center for that license type.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ask Copilot to rewrite text as a list
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in PowerPoint will rewrite paragraphs into bullet points or lists.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: OneDrive: New annotation layout and tools for PDF editing
CurrentVersion.description: The new PDF annotation layout features a more intuitive design where all annotation tools are now conveniently located in a single row at the top of the screen. A new type of eraser has been added to allow for more precise editing which can remove annotations pixel by pixel.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New predicate in Email DLP - Detect number of domains/Recipients
CurrentVersion.description: The "Recipient/Domain Count Over" feature, designed to address a critical need for managing and controlling the distribution of sensitive information via email. This feature allows organizations to set specific policies that trigger alerts or actions when the number of recipients or domains in outgoing emails exceeds a defined threshold. By implementing this feature, organizations can enhance data security, ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, and prevent unauthorized data dissemination, providing peace of mind and safeguarding sensitive information.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - New predicate in Email DLP - Detect number of domains/Recipients

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Search with apps and agents personalized suggestionss
CurrentVersion.description: We are enhancing Teams search personalized suggestions to include apps and agents. When searching in Teams you will now also get apps and agent suggestions which dynamically update as you type.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Recipient-triggered policy tips (policy tip to wait for recipient)
CurrentVersion.description: This feature ensures that policy tips are displayed only after recipients are added to an email, minimizing user disruption from DLP policy tips. With this improvement, relevant policy tips are only shown to users as they draft emails after the proper policy conditions are met.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control When Shared Content Is Visible to Attendees in 'Manage what attendees see'
CurrentVersion.description: An enhancement to the 'Manage what attendees see' feature, allowing organizers and presenters to control when shared content is visible to attendees. This capability is available for Meetings, Webinars and Town halls.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: External tag in contact suggestions
CurrentVersion.description: An "External" tag will be added to contact suggestions that appear in the dropdown when entering contacts in the email compose form. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Secure password deployment in the Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description: The secure password deployment feature in the Edge management service enables admins to deploy encrypted shared passwords to a set of users, allowing them to log into websites seamlessly without ever seeing the actual passwords. This reduces the risk of unauthorized access and enhances the organization's overall security posture.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Paste to Browser prevention support on macOS device with endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Endpoint Data Loss Prevention adds support on users trying to paste sensitive content into web browsers on macOS devices using Edge, Safari, and other browsers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- MacOS parity – Full file evidence
CurrentVersion.description: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) can copy the item that matches a DLP policy from onboarded MacOS devices to an Azure storage account. This creates full file evidence parity for MacOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Rework of Work Feed on Edge New Tab Page (NTP)
CurrentVersion.description:
The Work Feed experience, available on the New Tab Page (NTP) for Commercial users, will have changing and updated functionalities. These changes will include renewed focus on productivity and M365 modules. 

New tab page policies will continue to be enforced and not impacted by this updated Work Feed experience.

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: Designer is now part of Copilot, enhanced with new template and slide Suggestions.
CurrentVersion.description: Designer is now part of Copilot. Copilot Suggestions now brings you familiar Designer slide layout and presentation template suggestions in a vertical gallery, along with new capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: 2-click view of encrypted emails in New Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will now support 2-click view for encrypted emails. This feature enables admins to require user confirmation before allowing access to encrypted emails. #newoutlookforwindows
